name: QuoVadis
overview:
QuoVadis Limited provides online identity certification services in Bermuda. The company offers identity management services, such as digital certificate, root signing, trusted time-stamp, and managed secureID services; and security services, including sentry monitoring, sweeper message management, and vulnerability scanning services, as well as managed devices. It also provides availability and continuity services, such as secure centre, data vault backup, work area recovery, system recovery, and advanced availability services. The companyâ€™s secure centre services include onsite customer control centre, transition support and configuration assistance, network security, sentry monitoring and response, and managed data backup services. In addition, it offers professional services, such as public key infrastructure consulting and security consulting services. The company serves financial service, insurance, and retail sectors.

The company has additional operations in Switzerland, Holland, the United Kingdom, and New Zealand. QuoVadis Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.

funding_rounds.source_description: QuoVadis Attracts Significant Investment from ABRY Partners
